name: The Angel's Heir: Prologue
description:
Prologue What sort of Knight are you?

A demo for a fantasy dating sim that takes place in the plains of Lancedel.

Before you found yourself as Prince Lavandin's knight, you were a child with dreams - and nightmares. Everything you've done - everything you've been through - has all been to shape your story. And how does it go, again?
